title: Trump’s new Security Strategy paints Europe as weak and facing ‘civilisational erosion’
description: If a European country becomes ‘majority non-European’, the strategy says Washington would reconsider its alliance.
content: If any European leader hoped they could woo the US president with gifts, flattery and promises of defence spending, America’s new National Security Strategy is a stark reminder of what the Trump admi… [+3368 chars]
